prefixIntro.title: 词根 -sume-
prefixIntro.description:
核心意境是 **“拿” (Take)**。
表示获取、承担或推测。
prefixIntro.imagery: 联想一只手把东西拿起来✊。
prefixIntro.visual: <path d='M12 4 v8' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' /><path d='M8 12 l4 -4 l4 4' stroke='currentColor' />

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='10' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='8' cy='10' r='1.5' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='16' cy='10' r='1.5' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M12 16h4' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M14 14v4' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' transform='rotate(20 14 16)'/>
words.imagery: 用手指着下巴思考的样子，表示假设。

sentences.en: It seems reasonable to assume that the book was written around 70 A.D.
sentences.cn: 假设这本书写于公元70年左右似乎是合理的。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='10' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M14 9q1-2 2 0' stroke='currentColor'/><circle cx='8' cy='10' r='1.5' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='16' cy='10' r='1.5' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M10 16h4' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 戴着单片眼镜仔细审视，表示基于证据的推测。

sentences.en: I presume we'll be there by 6 o'clock.
sentences.cn: 我推测我们6点前能到那里。
